content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_diorite
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 4, "index": 28}, {"type": "red_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 32}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 63, "index": 34}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 41, "index": 41}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 61, "index": 42}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft polished_diorite, I need to craft diorite first. Diorite requires quartz, which can be obtained by smelting nether_quartz_ore. Therefore, I will smelt the nether_quartz_ore in slot 28 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 28 to slot 12 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_diorite
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 3, "index": 28}, {"type": "red_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 32}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 63, "index": 34}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 41, "index": 41}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 61, "index": 42}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]
thought: I still need one more quartz to craft the diorite, so I will smelt another nether_quartz_ore from slot 28 into an empty slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 28 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_diorite
inventory=[{"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_sign", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 2, "index": 28}, {"type": "red_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 32}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 63, "index": 34}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 41, "index": 41}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 61, "index": 42}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}]

thought: Now that I have two quartz, I can craft the diorite. I will place a cobblestone in the top-left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1), followed by the quartz in the top-middle (slot 2) and top-right (slot 3) corners.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
